songBuilder.title: Song Builder
songBuilder.description: Combine tracks, progressions, and harmony palettes in one intuitive workspace for seamless composition.
songBuilder.modalDescription: The Song Builder is your central creative hub where all musical elements come together. Create, arrange, and refine your music with an intuitive interface designed for both beginners and professionals.
features: Professional Transport Controls with play, stop, record, loop functionality, BPM, meter, metronome and DAW sync
Interactive Timeline with grid snapping, zoom controls, and countoff capabilities
Multi-Track Management with per-track mute/solo, volume controls, and routing options
Comprehensive Arrangement View providing a holistic perspective of all voicings and patterns
Chord Progression Framework serving as the harmonic foundation for your compositions
Informative Keyboard Display showing chord voicings and voice leading

harmonyPalettes.title: Harmony Palettes
harmonyPalettes.description: Shape melodies and chords through an intuitive gestural interface for fluid musical expression.
harmonyPalettes.modalDescription: Control harmony like a physical instrument with our intuitive gestural interface. Manipulate, arrange, and explore chord relationships through a tactile experience that makes complex music theory accessible and expressive.
features: Customizable Bank Arrangement to organize your chord collections through drag and drop
Drag and Drop Voicings directly from palettes to your progression timeline
Curated Collection Library with pre-selected scales and chord relationships
One-Click Transposition for instantly shifting keys across your entire composition
Voicing Parameter Dashboard for quick adjustments to chord characteristics
Custom Bank Creation for building your personal chord vocabulary

patternEditor.title: Dynamic Pattern Editor
patternEditor.description: Create intelligent musical patterns that adapt to chord changes in real time.
patternEditor.modalDescription: The Dynamic Pattern Editor enables you to create complex musical motifs that respond intelligently to changes in your chord progressions. Build melodies and rhythmic sequences that maintain musical coherence even as the harmony shifts.
features: Intelligent Adaptation to chord progression changes in real-time
Advanced Piano Roll Interface with powerful editing tools
Context-Aware Note Entry with scale, chord, and voicing intelligence to prevent harmonic clashes
Dual Mode Operation with relative and absolute patterns for both contextual and fixed melodic content
Melodic Essence Extraction that captures the intent of any melody for reuse in different harmonic contexts

voicingGenerator.title: Voicing Generator
voicingGenerator.description: Transform chord progressions into expressive voicings with professional voice leading and harmonic control.
voicingGenerator.modalDescription: The Voicing Generator transforms simple chord symbols into complex, expressive harmonic structures. Fine-tune every aspect of your chord voicings from global styles to individual note placement, creating professional arrangements that breathe life into your music.
features: Advanced Chord Editor with comprehensive scale and chord configuration tools for complete harmonic customization
Intelligent Voice Leading with automatic smooth transitions between chord changes based on proximity, common tones, and voice direction
Texture Controls including voicing width, density, inversions, octave distribution, and register placement
Harmonic Extensions with configurable 7ths, 9ths, 11ths and 13ths to add richness and color to your progressions
Multi-Level Settings allowing global changes to entire songs or focused edits to specific chord voicings with a single adjustment

progressionTimeline.title: Progression Timeline
progressionTimeline.description: Learn from ghost tracks and transform existing songs with powerful reharmonization tools.
progressionTimeline.modalDescription: The Progression Timeline streamlines the process of building, refining, and transforming chord progressions. With educational ghost tracks and powerful reharmonization tools, you can both learn from and reinvent your favorite music.
features: Intuitive Timeline Interface for visual progression building
Ghost Track Learning System that teaches progression structure
Real-time Reharmonization to transform existing progressions
Section-based Organization for structured composition
Drag and Drop Chord Arrangement for easily rearranging chords and adjusting their length by dragging boundaries
Display Toggling to show chord names as letters, Roman numerals, or solfege based on preference
Dynamic Pattern Updates where patterns and voicings automatically adapt when changes are made to the progression

voiceHandling.title: Advanced Voice Handling
voiceHandling.description: Control voice count, interactions, and MIDI routing for complete arrangement flexibility.
voiceHandling.modalDescription: Advanced Voice Handling provides granular control over each individual voice in your composition. Manage voice count, behavior, interaction, and routing to create complex arrangements with complete creative freedom.
features: Dynamic Voice Count for arrangement flexibility - Add or remove voices for different textures
Smooth Voice Leading to control how voices move together - Options for parallel, contrary, or independent motion
Per-Voice MIDI Channel Routing for multi-instrument setups - Send voices to different instruments
Voice Range Constraints for instrument-appropriate writing - Set upper and lower limits for each voice
Designated Bass Channel for foundation control - Discrete controls for pedal tones and voice leading
Voice / Channel Matrix for effortless MIDI routing - Visually map voices to MIDI channels and instruments

step1.title: Start with Chord Progressions
step1.description: Begin with pre-crafted templates or effortlessly build your own chord progressions by dragging voicings from the Harmony palette. The app automatically analyzes scales and modes, ensuring your music follows proper theory principles.

step2.title: Layer Multiple Tracks
step2.description: Create rich compositions with multiple tracks that intelligently work together. Add harmony, melodies, and rhythms—all synchronized and harmonically compatible with your chord progression.

step3.title: Customize with Precision
step3.description: Fine-tune your sound with detailed customization. Adjust inversions, voicing density, tension notes, and harmonic extensions to craft everything from simple triads to complex jazz harmonies.

step4.title: Intelligent Musicality
step4.description: Experience professional-level musicality with intelligent voice leading that ensures smooth chord transitions. Access composition tools previously available only to trained musicians, empowering you to create sophisticated harmonies with confidence.

step1.title: Ghost Track Learning
step1.description: Master chord progressions through interactive ghost tracks that guide your playing. Experiment with reharmonization in real-time, watching as the app adapts to your creative choices while maintaining musical coherence.

step2.title: Interactive Harmonic Analysis
step2.description: Explore comprehensive harmonic displays that reveal the theory behind your music. Visualize voicings, patterns, scales, and chords in real-time, gaining deep insights into the musical structure of your creations.

step3.title: Pattern-Based Learning
step3.description: Start with a simple pattern and watch it evolve as you explore different scales and chord qualities. The app's visual feedback helps you understand how each note contributes to the overall harmony, while the pattern editor lets you experiment with variations and build your musical intuition.

step4.title: Refine Your Skills
step4.description: Improve your musical ear by experimenting with different chord substitutions and modal interchange. As you refine your harmonic choices, you'll develop a deeper understanding of chord qualities and progressions, naturally building both your technical skills and creative voice.

step1.title: DAW Compatibility
step1.description: Use Cymasphere as a standalone application or as a VST/AU plugin within your DAW. Whether you're sketching ideas independently or integrating directly into your production, the app adapts to your preferred workflow.

step2.title: Multi-Track Control
step2.description: Manage multiple tracks simultaneously, each with its own independent voice settings and patterns. Create rich, layered arrangements by assigning different musical elements to separate tracks within your DAW.

step3.title: Voice Channel Matrix
step3.description: Precisely control where each voice is sent using the channel matrix. Route individual voices to specific MIDI channels in your DAW, giving you complete control over instrument assignment and voice distribution.

step4.title: Seamless Workflow
step4.description: Integrate Cymasphere into your production process as a powerful harmony and pattern generator. Use it to quickly sketch ideas, develop complex progressions, and create musical patterns that feed directly into your DAW's instruments.

faq.title: Frequently Asked Questions
faq.subtitle: Find answers to common questions about Cymasphere

questions.question: What is Cymasphere?
questions.answer: Cymasphere is an AI-powered music creation tool that helps you generate professional-sounding music quickly and easily.

questions.question: Do I need musical experience to use Cymasphere?
questions.answer: No, Cymasphere is designed to be accessible for users of all skill levels, from beginners to professionals.

questions.question: What file formats can I export my music in?
questions.answer: You can export your creations as MIDI files, WAV audio, or MP3 files, depending on your subscription plan.

questions.question: Is there a free trial available?
questions.answer: Yes, we offer a 14-day free trial so you can explore all the features before committing to a subscription.

questions.question: Can I use Cymasphere with my existing DAW?
questions.answer: Absolutely! Cymasphere works as a standalone application or can be integrated with popular DAWs like Ableton Live, Logic Pro, FL Studio, and more.
